analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol:
	Contract ChainmonstersShop has payable functions:
	 - purchasePackage (/unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol#574-594)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	External calls:

	State variables written after the call(s):

DSValue.read.has (local variable @ /unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol#287) shadows:
	- DSValue.has (state variable @ /unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol#277)

Reentrancy in ChainmonstersShop.purchasePackage (/unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol#574-594):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.value == priceOf(packages[_id].price)) (/unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol#582-583)

	- totalCoinsSold (/unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol#588)

Reentrancy in ChainmonstersShop.setMedianizer (/unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(_medianizer.isMedianizer(),given address is not a medianizer contract!) (/unique_chucks/26/0x30d5f039375a1c6977b32225ad8c9a409d5dd31f.sol)
